thread.title: BRIEF-Halcón Resources Q4 Loss Per Share $0.63

title: BRIEF-Halcón Resources Q4 Loss Per Share $0.63
text: 41 PM / Updated 5 minutes ago BRIEF-Halcón Resources Q4 Loss Per Share $0.63 Reuters Staff Feb 28 (Reuters) - Halcon Resources Corp: * HALCÓN RESOURCES ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER 2017 RESULTS AND PROVIDES AN OPERATIONAL UPDATE * Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $0.63 * Q4 REVENUE $25.3 MILLION * Q4 ADJUSTED LOSS PER SHARE $0.12 * QTRLY TOTAL PRODUCTION VOLUMES 578 MBOE VERSUS 3,553 MBOE * QTRLY AVERAGE DAILY PRODUCTION 6,283 BOE/D VERSUS 38,620 BOE/D * COMPANY EXPECTS Q1 2018 PRODUCTION TO AVERAGE BETWEEN 10,500 AND 11,500 BOE/D NET * Q4 REVENUE VIEW $26.5 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
